metrics.name: edgeBytesSum
metrics.description: The total volume of edge traffic for given objects and filters.

metrics.name: edgeHitsSum
metrics.description: The total number of edge requests for given objects and filters.

metrics.name: edgeResponseBytesSum
metrics.description: Sum of response bytes of edge traffic for given objects and filters.

metrics.name: edgeRequestBytesSum
metrics.description: Sum of request bytes of edge traffic for given objects and filters.

metrics.name: originBytesSum
metrics.description: The total volume of origin traffic for given objects and filters

metrics.name: originHitsSum
metrics.description: The total number of origin requests for given objects and filters.

metrics.name: originResponseBytesSum
metrics.description: Sum of response bytes of origin traffic for given objects and filters.

metrics.name: originRequestBytesSum
metrics.description: Sum of request bytes of origin traffic for given objects and filters.

metrics.name: midgressBytesSum
metrics.description: The total volume of midgress traffic for given objects and filters.

metrics.name: midgressHitsSum
metrics.description: All hits with all response codes delivered from the Tiered Distribution network, that is bytes served from the Tiered Distribution infrastructure to edge servers.

metrics.name: midgressResponseBytesSum
metrics.description: Sum of response bytes of midgress traffic for given objects and filters.

metrics.name: midgressRequestBytesSum
metrics.description: Sum of request bytes of midgress traffic for given objects and filters.

metrics.name: offloadedHitsPercentage
metrics.description: The number of hits served from the CDN as a percentage of total hits served for given objects and filters.

metrics.name: offloadedBytesPercentage
metrics.description: The volume served from the CDN as a percentage of total volume served for given objects and filters.

metrics.name: offloadedRequestBytesPercentage
metrics.description: The request volume served from the CDN as a percentage of total volume served for given objects and filters.

metrics.name: offloadedResponseBytesPercentage
metrics.description: The response volume served from the CDN as a percentage of total volume served for given objects and filters.

dimensions.name: cpcode
dimensions.description: Content provider (CP) code for which you want data included.

dimensions.name: hostname
dimensions.description: Hostname for which you want data included.

dimensions.name: responseCode
dimensions.description: An HTTP response status code. For example, 201.

dimensions.name: responseClass
dimensions.description: An HTTP response status code class. For example, 2xx.

dimensions.name: responseStatus
dimensions.description: An HTTP response status, either success or error.

dimensions.name: httpMethod
dimensions.description: An HTTP method for which you want data included, either put_post or get_head.

dimensions.name: cacheability
dimensions.description: Indicates whether the content is storable.

dimensions.name: ipVersion
dimensions.description: IP format for which you want data included, either ipv4 or ipv6.

dimensions.name: httpProtocol
dimensions.description: HTTP version for which you want data included. For example, http3.

dimensions.name: arlId
dimensions.description: Unique identifier of the resource locator.
